amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available to enter into any contract with an incorporated entity where such entity's sealed bid or competitive proposal shows that such entity is incorporated or chartered in Bermuda, Barbados, the Cayman Islands, Antigua, or Panama.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 231 (Roll no. 275).
